column1: #text=A few years ago I rode the train from Arizona to Washington state .
#text=When it came time to board the train I got a ride from a friend , who dropped me off right next to the tracks .
#text=I showed my ticket to the train attendant , and he let me aboard the train .
#text=There was another person on the train who showed me what seat to sit in .
#text=After everyone had boarded , the train got moving .
#text=The trip from Arizona to Washington takes a week , with a lot of stops in between .
#text=The serve food right on the train , but it also stops in a lot of towns where you can get off and eat or buy souvenirs .
#text=Not much happens while you are on the train , but there is a lot to look out and see from the windows .
#text=When we finally reached Washington the train conductor made an announcement over the intercom , and I got off at my stop , then went home to my family .
